mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cookingtip_board (bno, category, content) VALUES (common_board_seq.currval, #{category}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT cb.bno, cb.title, cb.writer, cb.regdate, cb.viewcnt, cb.replycnt, cb.uuid, cb.uploadpath, cb.filename, ct.category, ct.content FROM common_board cb JOIN cookingtip_board ct ON cb.bno = ct.bno WHERE cb.bno = #{bno}

SELECT bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt, uuid, uploadpath, filename FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(common_board COMMON_BOARD_BNO_PK) */ rownum rn, bno, boardId, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt, uuid, uploadpath, filename FROM common_board WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND boardId = 3) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM common_board WHERE bno > 0 AND boardId = 4
